solution_line_template: In total, there are {num_people} x {pieces_per_pizza} = <<{num_people}*{pieces_per_pizza}={total_pieces}>>{total_pieces} pizza pieces.

Bill and Dale eat {bill_dale_count} x {pieces_per_pizza} x {bill_dale_percent_num}% = <<{bill_dale_count}*{pieces_per_pizza}*{bill_dale_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={bill_dale_eaten}>>{bill_dale_eaten} pieces.

Ann and Cate eat {ann_cate_count} x {pieces_per_pizza} x {ann_cate_percent_num}% = <<{ann_cate_count}*{pieces_per_pizza}*{ann_cate_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={ann_cate_eaten}>>{ann_cate_eaten} pieces.
The four of them eat {bill_dale_eaten} + {ann_cate_eaten} = <<{bill_dale_eaten}+{ann_cate_eaten}={total_eaten}>>{total_eaten} pieces.
